caption: Insert Embed
doc: This action allows you to insert an embed at a specified index in the editor's content.

AAu.caption: Index
AAu.doc: The index at which to insert the embed.
AAu.name: index

AAv.caption: Type
AAv.doc: The type of embed to insert, such as "image", "video", or "audio".
AAv.name: type

AAw.caption: Value
AAw.doc: The value of the embed to insert, which can be anything depending on the type of embed.
AAw.name: value
